name: Castlevania Season 3
summary: 贝尔蒙特和赛法尔在一个藏有邪恶秘密的村庄里安顿下来。阿鲁卡多为一对仰慕者提供指导。艾萨克开始寻找赫克托的下落。
info:
• 中文名: 恶魔城 第三季
  • 话数: 10
  • 放送开始: 2020年3月5日
  • 动画制作: Frederator Studios
  • 播放网站: Netflix
  • imdb_id: tt9217782

eps.name: Bless Your Dead Little Hearts
eps.desc: Alucard adjusts to his lonely new life, Belmont and Sypha pay a visit to an eerie and unusual town, and Carmilla returns home with a prize.

eps.name: The Reparation of My Heart
eps.desc: Isaac gets some unexpected help in his search for Hector. Meanwhile, Carmilla plots a land grab and Alucard meets some fans.

eps.name: Investigators
eps.desc: Belmont and Sypha's plan to leave Lindenfeld hits a snag. Isaac and the Captain debate the merits of humanity. Hector tries to get a read on Lenore.

eps.name: I Have a Scheme
eps.desc: Sumi and Taka share their history with Alucard. Also, Saint Germain gains entrance to the priory, and Isaac receives an icy welcome in Genoa.

eps.name: A Seat of Civilisation and Refinement
eps.desc: Belmont and the Judge discover an ominous symbol, Saint Germain's treasure hunt is cut short, and Alucard's bond with Sumi and Taka continues to grow.

eps.name: The Good Dream
eps.desc: Lenore continues to spend time with Hector, slowly earning his trust. Saint Germain experiences a telling nightmare about the Infinite Corridor.

eps.name: Worse Things Than Betrayal
eps.desc: As Saint Germain makes unsettling discoveries, Isaac marches toward a showdown. Meanwhile, Belmont and Sypha question a monk — aggressively.

eps.name: What the Night Brings
eps.desc: Something is alive in the priory's basement, and for Belmont and Sypha, time is of the essence. Lenore opens up to Hector about Carmilla’s plans.

eps.name: The Harvest
eps.desc: Night falls on Lindenfeld and all manner of hell breaks loose. Also, Isaac meets the Magician, Hector makes a pledge, and Sumi and Taka make a move.

eps.name: Abandon All Hope
eps.desc: With the portal to hell open, Trevor and Sypha must battle an onslaught. Meanwhile, the Judge shares a disturbing legacy, and Hector learns his fate.
